item.description:
IT'S COMING.....

Friday, May 16, 2008.....

Ritmo Masacote's "Fantagious" CD Release!


A NOT TO BE MISSED 2 HOUR THEATER Concert Featuring:
Ritmo Masacote AND Masacote Dance Company LIVE!

7:30-10:00pm


Buy Your Tickets Online Now! NO Tickets sold @ door!
http://www.masacotere...

NO PASSES WILL BE SOLD @ THE DOOR!

-- $35
-- $25 Meetup Discount
-- Student Discount: $20!

******************************************
What to Expect

-- A 2-hour Theater Production
-- A Latin Jazz concert with Ritmo Masacote Live!
-- Dance Performances by Masacote Dance Company!
-- Special Guest Artists from Bermuda, Atlanta, Texas!
-- Singing DEBUT of Gordon Neil, Masacote Records!
-- Special Surprises!
-- An Afterparty to top it all off!!!



******************************************
BUY YOUR TICKETS NOW!
NO TICKETS WILL BE SOLD AT DOOR! BUY NOW!

-- $35
-- $25 Meetup Discount
-- Student Discount: $20!

item.how_to_find_us: I'll be performing on stage with the company!
item.why: You'll love it because it will be like no other salsa event you've been to before! It will be one event to remember!
